com.xorprogramming.game.achievement

Class Achievement<E extends Enum<E>,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xorprogramming.game.achievement.Achievement<E,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - An enum that contains the various game actions that could trigger an achievement check
    T - The type of object to check to see if the achievement is unlocked

    public abstract class Achievement<E extends Enum<E>,T>
extends Object
    An abstract class representing a game achievement. An achievement starts out locked and can be unlocked if an achievement check succeeds. Once unlocked, it cannot be relocked. An achievement also has a set of events that trigger an achievement check. Instances of this class should be managed with an AchievementManager.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Steven Roberts
    See Also:
    AchievementManager

    • Constructor Detail

      • Achievement

        public Achievement(int saveId,
           String name,
           String description,
           E firstCheckAction,
           E... otherCheckActions)
        Create a new Achievement object.
        Parameters:
        saveId - A unique identifier used by a AchievementManager for saving
        name - The name
        description - Explains the conditions under which the achievement can be unlocked
        firstCheckAction - The first enum item representing an action that triggers an achievement check
        otherCheckActions - The remaining enum items

    • Method Detail

      • checkAchievement

        protected abstract boolean checkAchievement(E action,
                       T checkObject)
        Checks if the achievement is unlocked by examining the generic checkObject
        Parameters:
        action - The action that triggered the check
        checkObject - The object to check to see if the achievement is unlocked
        Returns:
        true if unlocked, false otherwise

      • isUnlocked

        public final boolean isUnlocked()
        Checks if the achievement is unlocked.
        Returns:
        true if unlocked, false otherwise

      • getAcievementUnlockTime

        public final Long getAcievementUnlockTime()
        Gets the time at which the achievement was unlocked.
        Returns:
        The time in milliseconds since the epoch, or null if not yet unlocked

        Gets the achievement description
